meanings.definition: A fragrant root of certain irises, used in perfumery.
meanings.sent1: The orris added a lovely scent to the perfume.
meanings.sent2: She sprinkled some orris in the potpourri to make it smell nice.
meanings.sent3: The orris root whispered a sweet fragrance to the flowers around it.
meanings.sent4: The orris root was a magician, enchanting the air with its aromatic spell.
meanings.sent5: The orris root danced in the perfume, spreading its delightful aroma.

meanings.definition: A powder made from dried orris root, used in perfumes and potpourri.
meanings.sent1: The orris powder gave the perfume a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: She bought some orris to make her potpourri more fragrant.
meanings.sent3: The orris powder tickled the nose of anyone who came near it.
meanings.sent4: The orris powder was like a fairy dust, making everything smell magical.
meanings.sent5: The orris powder floated in the air, leaving a trail of delightful fragrance.
